about_the_game:
This is a leisure and entertainment game with dance and DIY as the theme. Players can choose the gender, age and dress of the character by themselves, and customize their favorite character image. Let the objects you design yourself start dancing! There are many dance music to choose from on the page. The dancers dance on the sea. Players can also choose to throw balls, set off fireworks and water guns for interaction. The whole process is full of rhythm and fun. It is a very casual and relaxing game.

Instructions：
The left handle board can select the sending position, and the trigger button sends;
The touchpad on the right handle can interact with the menu, and the trigger button is OK.

Players can also choose to throw balls, set off fireworks and water guns for interaction. The whole process is full of rhythm and fun. It is a very casual and relaxing game.

Instructions：
The left handle board can select the sending position, and the trigger button sends;
The touchpad on the right handle can interact with the menu, and the trigger button is OK.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Korean
